channel.title: Palm Royale on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Binge the Show. Buy the Look! From ‘White Lotus’ to ‘Emily in Paris’ (Almost) Everything Is for Sale
item.description: TV’s richest characters are miserable narcissists. Now, thanks to a slew of screen-inspired fashion collaborations, you can dress just like them.
